meta.title: Feeltracker | AI-Powered Health & Wellness Journal Apps for iOS
meta.description: Track your health effortlessly with Feeltracker's suite of AI-powered diary apps. Monitor blood pressure, mood, weight, sleep, and daily thoughts. Sync with Apple Health, get AI insights, and export data to share with your doctor. Available on iPhone, iPad, and Mac.
meta.keywords: health tracker app, blood pressure monitor, mood diary, weight tracker, sleep tracker, daily journal, AI health app, Apple Health integration, health diary, wellness tracker, mental health app, blood pressure app, weight loss app, sleep monitoring, journal app
meta.ogTitle: Feeltracker | AI-Powered Health & Wellness Journal Apps
meta.ogDescription: Track your health effortlessly with AI-powered diary apps for blood pressure, mood, weight, sleep, and journaling. Sync with Apple Health and get personalized insights.
meta.twitterDescription: Track your health effortlessly with AI-powered diary apps for blood pressure, mood, weight, sleep, and journaling.

data.structuredDataHtml:
<script type="application/ld+json">
    {
      "@context": "https://schema.org",

      "name": "Feeltracker",
      "url": "https://feeltracker.com",
      "logo": "https://feeltracker.com/images/feeltracker.png",
      "description": "AI-powered health and wellness tracking apps for iOS",
      "sameAs": [
        "https://x.com/feeltracker"
      ],
      "contactPoint": {
        "@type": "ContactPoint",
        "email": "support@feeltracker.com",
        "contactType": "Customer Support"
      }
    }
    </script>
    <script type="application/ld+json">
    {
      "@context": "https://schema.org",
      "@type": "SoftwareApplication",
      "name": "Feeltracker Health & Wellness Apps",
      "applicationCategory": "HealthApplication",
      "operatingSystem": "iOS",
      "description": "Suite of AI-powered health and wellness tracking apps for iOS. Monitor blood pressure, mood, weight, sleep, and daily thoughts. Sync with Apple Health, get AI insights, and export data to share with your doctor.",
      "image": "https://feeltracker.com/images/feeltracker.png",
      "offers": {
        "@type": "Offer",
        "price": "0",
        "priceCurrency": "USD"
      },
      "aggregateRating": {
        "@type": "AggregateRating",
        "ratingValue": "4.8",
        "ratingCount": 20000
      },
      "author": {
        "@type": "Organization",
        "name": "Custom Arts"
      },
      "featureList": [
        "AI-powered health insights",
        "Camera Scan AI for reading capture",
        "Apple Health bidirectional sync",
        "Export reports to PDF and Excel",
        "iCloud backup and sync",
        "33 language support",
        "No ads, no tracking, privacy first"
      ],
      "inLanguage": ["en", "es", "fr", "de", "it", "nl", "pt", "sv", "no", "da", "fi", "pl", "ru", "uk", "cs", "sk", "ro", "hr", "hu", "ar", "he", "zh", "ja", "ko", "th", "vi", "id", "el", "tr", "ca"],
      "datePublished": "2015"
    }
    </script>
    <script type="application/ld+json">
    {
      "@context": "https://schema.org",
      "@type": "SoftwareApplication",
      "name": "Feeltracker Health & Wellness Apps",
      "aggregateRating": {
        "@type": "AggregateRating",
        "ratingValue": "4.8",
        "ratingCount": 20000,
        "bestRating": "5",
        "worstRating": "1"
      },
      "review": [
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "MelGreer"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Best Blood Pressure App Experience",
          "reviewBody": "I've found the best blood pressure app I've ever tried. It not only lets me send results to my doctor, but people seem work tirelessly to keep the app running smoothly. They're constantly updating and improving it, which is awesome. Honestly, it's the best subscription I've got on my phone right now."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "CynnCatt"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Even my therapist likes this app",
          "reviewBody": "I just got diagnosed with adhd about a month ago. And I had to wait for 3 weeks to get meds for it. During that time I found this app, and it's been pretty amazing to see the erraticness of my un medicated brain compared to my medicated brain."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "PRE'"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "So far so good",
          "reviewBody": "This is a nice little simple app that does not overextend into unneeded areas. It is the simplicity of it, including the simplicity of the interface that I value more than anything."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Jbobthebuilder"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Calling all sleep Docs!",
          "reviewBody": "I was so surprised that my Sleep doctor was trying to give me pieces of paper to record my sleep hours with no way to even collate them!? Luckily I found this app and I immediately asked my Sleep doctor to start recommending it."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Wiesiu33"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Very good app",
          "reviewBody": "My doctor wants me to record my BP daily. This app allows me to record my info and records it in a very nicely designed format. Great app."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Aprthax"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Great app",
          "reviewBody": "As someone with bipolar disorder I needed to record my moods and emotions but I couldn't find an app that didn't want an expensive subscription. I'm very thankful for this app, full functionality without a subscription."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Absolutely Annoyed!"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Love this app!! So easy to use.",
          "reviewBody": "This app is awesome for monitoring your sleep habits, time and being able to make notes for future reference. It's simple and easy to use. The app developer Gaurav was absolutely amazing!! I highly recommend using this to keep a record of your sleep patterns."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "frdfranz"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Really Cool App",
          "reviewBody": "Just a few nights ago I started keeping a record of my blood pressure this app is really cool. I would recommend this app in a heartbeat."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "dariusslayss"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "i like it",
          "reviewBody": "i like how i dont need to pay for everything, on my other mood apps i have to pay to see what triggers me. it really helped me correct myself."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Gadget guy Fl"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Good app for tracking sleep patterns",
          "reviewBody": "I needed something to help with sleep tracking as I was starting CPAP therapy back in November 2022. This app has been great at keeping me accountable to a schedule and looking at my progress."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Tippy's Dad"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Fantastic App",
          "reviewBody": "Such a great app. It keeps track of my blood pressure. You won't go wrong here!"
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Rufuslynx"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Weight and BMI",
          "reviewBody": "I find this app is outstanding except for two minor flaws that just irritate me but still works out very well."
        }
      ]
    }
    </script>

hero.title: AI-Powered Health Tracking Made Simple
hero.subtitle: Track your blood pressure, mood, weight, sleep, and daily thoughts with intelligent diary apps that sync with Apple Health and provide personalized AI insights.
hero.privacyText: Privacy First ‚Äî No Ads, No Tracking, Your Data Stays Private

items.title: Blood Pressure Feeltracker
items.subtitle: Monitor OMRON High BP AI Diary
items.description: **Number 1 blood pressure app in the United Kingdom.** Track systolic, diastolic, and pulse readings with ease. Get AI-powered insights into what affects your blood pressure. Integrates with Apple Health and supports Camera Scan AI for reading values directly from your monitor screen.

features.text: Camera Scan AI to capture readings from monitor screens
Export reports to share with your doctor (PDF with large text option, Excel)
Apple Health integration for complete tracking

items.downloadAlt: Download Blood Pressure on App Store

items.title: Daily Journaling Feeltracker
items.subtitle: Notes Photos Thoughts AI Diary
items.description: Write daily reflections, track life events, and discover patterns in your thoughts. AI analyzes sentiment and helps you understand recurring themes through word frequency analysis.

features.text: **NEW:** Item Scanning - AI describes objects for your journal
**NEW:** Text Scanning - OCR to capture text from anywhere
Attach up to 8 photos per entry

items.downloadAlt: Download Daily Journaling on App Store

items.title: Mental Health Feeltracker
items.subtitle: Bipolar DBT CBT ADHD AI Diary
items.description: Monitor your emotional health with daily mood ratings and notes. Identify triggers and patterns with AI analysis. Supports iOS 18+ Mental Health integration with Apple Health.

features.text: iOS 18+ Mental Health (State of Mind) sync
**NEW:** Face Scanning - analyze mood from selfies with AI

items.downloadAlt: Download Mood Tracker on App Store

items.title: Weight Feeltracker
items.subtitle: Lose Body Mass % Food AI Diary
items.description: Track weight, body fat percentage, and BMI over time. Scan readings with Camera Scan AI, see monthly averages, identify what helps or hinders your progress, and sync with Apple Health for comprehensive fitness tracking.

features.text: Camera Scan AI to capture weight from scale displays
Weight, BMI, and body fat tracking
**NEW:** Food Scanning - instant nutritional analysis with AI
Discover what affects your weight through AI insights

items.downloadAlt: Download Weight Tracker on App Store

items.title: Sleep Feeltracker
items.subtitle: Apnea Monitor Dreams Log Diary
items.description: Log sleep and wake times to monitor your sleep patterns and duration. Integrates with Apple Health's sleep data and helps identify factors affecting your sleep quality through AI analysis.

features.text: Simple sleep and wake time logging
Identify what affects your sleep quality

items.downloadAlt: Download Sleep Tracker on App Store

items.title: AI-Powered Insights
items.description: Get personalized insights and pattern detection powered by advanced AI. Understand what affects your health and make informed decisions.

items.title: Apple Health Integration
items.description: Seamlessly sync with Apple Health for comprehensive tracking. Read and write health data across all your devices automatically.

items.title: iCloud Sync & Backup
items.description: Your data automatically syncs across iPhone, iPad, and Mac via iCloud. Optional automatic weekly JSON backups ensure your data is always safe and exportable.

items.title: Privacy First
items.description: **No advertisements. No tracking.** Your health data is encrypted and stored only on your devices and iCloud. We don't track you across apps or websites (no IDFA or similar tracking technologies), and we never sell your data to advertisers.

items.title: Export & Share
items.description: Export your data as PDF (with large text option), Excel, or JSON. Share comprehensive reports with your doctor or healthcare provider easily.

items.title: 33 Languages
items.description: Fully localized in 33 languages: English, Spanish (Espa√±ol), French (Fran√ßais), French Canadian, German (Deutsch), Italian (Italiano), Dutch (Nederlands), Portuguese Brazil (Portugu√™s), Portuguese Portugal, Swedish (Svenska), Norwegian (Norsk), Danish (Dansk), Finnish (Suomi), Polish (Polski), Russian (–†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π), Ukrainian (–£–∫—Ä–∞—ó–Ω—Å—å–∫–∞), Czech (ƒåe≈°tina), Slovak (Slovenƒçina), Romanian (Rom√¢nƒÉ), Croatian (Hrvatski), Hungarian (Magyar), Arabic (ÿßŸÑÿπÿ±ÿ®Ÿäÿ©), Hebrew (◊¢◊ë◊®◊ô◊™), Simplified Chinese (ÁÆÄ‰Ωì‰∏≠Êñá), Traditional Chinese (ÁπÅÈ´î‰∏≠Êñá), Japanese (Êó•Êú¨Ë™û), Korean (ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥), Thai (‡πÑ‡∏ó‡∏¢), Vietnamese (Ti·∫øng Vi·ªát), Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia), Greek (ŒïŒªŒªŒ∑ŒΩŒπŒ∫Œ¨), Turkish (T√ºrk√ße), and Catalan (Catal√†).

items.title: Weather Integration
items.description: Automatically include weather data from Apple's weather service with your entries. Track how weather patterns affect your blood pressure, mood, sleep, or weight over time.

items.title: Multiple Calendar Systems
items.description: Support for Gregorian, Islamic (Hijri), Hebrew, Chinese, and Japanese calendars. View your health data in the calendar system that's most meaningful to you.

items.title: iPad Split View
items.description: Optimized multi-column layout for iPad with full split-screen multitasking support. Work with your health data alongside other apps for maximum productivity.

items.title: Multiple Dark Modes
items.description: Choose from multiple dark mode variants including true black (perfect for OLED screens) and dark gray themes. Customize your viewing experience to reduce eye strain.

items.title: Time Zone Support
items.description: Track entries with custom time zone settings. Perfect for travelers or shift workers who need accurate time tracking across different time zones.

items.title: Milestone Tracking
items.description: Celebrate your progress with achievement milestones. Get recognized for consistent tracking, reaching health goals, and maintaining healthy habits.

aiFeatures.title: Powered by Artificial Intelligence
aiFeatures.subtitle: Our AI features help you understand your health data like never before

free.title: Ask a Question
free.description: Quick Q&A about your data - get instant answers to your health questions

free.title: Chat
free.description: Have interactive conversations about your health journey and get personalized guidance

free.title: Voice Summary
free.description: Listen to audio summaries of your health trends - perfect for on-the-go insights

free.title: Make Me Laugh
free.description: Get personalized humor from your tracking data to brighten your day

free.title: Calm Me Down
free.description: AI-guided breathing and relaxation exercises to help reduce stress

free.title: Camera Scan AI
free.description: Scan readings from device screens, analyze faces for mood, identify objects, capture text - AI vision across all apps

premium.title: Daily Insights Banner
premium.description: Wake up to personalized AI-generated daily tips based on your last 30 entries - smart 10-15 word insights that help you understand your health patterns

premium.title: Deep Research Reports
premium.description: Comprehensive AI analysis of your health data with detailed insights and professional-grade summaries

premium.title: Pattern Detective
premium.description: Advanced AI finds hidden correlations between lifestyle factors, time of day, and your health metrics

premium.title: Goal Assistant
premium.description: Get personalized, data-driven health goals based on your unique patterns and progress

premium.title: Doctor Summary
premium.description: Generate professional medical summaries for healthcare visits with statistics and trend analysis

premium.title: Sick Note Generator
premium.description: AI-generated sick notes for work or school based on your health tracking data

premium.title: Story Generator
premium.description: Transform your health data into creative, engaging narratives and personalized stories

premium.title: Text Summary
premium.description: Create shareable text message summaries of your health trends for friends and family

premium.title: Personalized Quiz
premium.description: Test your knowledge with a fun AI-generated 10-question quiz about your data

premium.title: Text-to-Speech
premium.description: Listen to your AI insights and summaries with natural voice playback - perfect for accessibility

premium.title: Tailored Health Report
premium.description: Create comprehensive, personalized health documents with AI-generated insights about your progress

aiFeatures.disclaimerTitle: AI Disclaimer
aiFeatures.disclaimerText: AI-generated insights, reports, and recommendations are for general information only and are not a substitute for medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. AI-identified patterns show correlations, but correlation does not imply causation. Always consult a physician or qualified healthcare provider with any medical questions or concerns. These tools are designed to help you organize and understand your health data, not to provide medical guidance.

socialProof.title: Trusted by Thousands of Users Worldwide
socialProof.subtitle: Join users who are taking control of their health

reviews.title: What Our Users Say
reviews.subtitle: Real reviews from the App Store

items.title: Best Blood Pressure App Experience
items.content: I've found the best blood pressure app I've ever tried. It not only lets me send results to my doctor, but people seem work tirelessly to keep the app running smoothly. They're constantly updating and improving it, which is awesome. Honestly, it's the best subscription I've got on my phone right now.
items.author: MelGreer, Blood Pressure

items.title: Even my therapist likes this app
items.content: I just got diagnosed with adhd about a month ago. And I had to wait for 3 weeks to get meds for it. During that time I found this app, and it's been pretty amazing to see the erraticness of my un medicated brain compared to my medicated brain. My medicated brain is much more level in the graph. Plus I like that I can jot down what's on my mind really fast.
items.author: CynnCatt, Mood Diary

items.title: So far so good
items.content: This is a nice little simple app that does not overextend into unneeded areas. It is the simplicity of it, including the simplicity of the interface that I value more than anything. I don't need flowers and squirrels and games and peekaboo things and rainbow unicorns. I just need a simple diary-like note app. So far this app has fulfilled those requirements or lack of requirements. It's sort of refreshing. I also appreciate that you can export it in PDF form when there is a need to do so. Thank you for keeping it simple.
items.author: PRE', Daily Journaling

items.title: Calling all sleep Docs!
items.content: I was so surprised that my Sleep doctor was trying to give me pieces of paper to record my sleep hours with no way to even collate them!? When I asked for an app, they suggested consensus Sleep Diary, which is useless. Luckily I found this app and I immediately asked my Sleep doctor to start recommending it. I also appreciate how responsive the developer is. Clearly this person wants to improve lives. THANK YOU!!
items.author: Jbobthebuilder, Sleep Diary

items.title: Very good app
items.content: My doctor wants me to record my BP daily. This app allows me to record my info and records it in a very nicely designed format. Great app.
items.author: Wiesiu33, Blood Pressure

items.title: Great app
items.content: As someone with bipolar disorder I needed to record my moods and emotions but I couldn't find an app that didn't want an expensive subscription. I'm very thankful for this app, full functionality without a subscription and a subscription option if you want one.
items.author: Aprthax, Mood Diary

items.title: Love this app!! So easy to use.
items.content: First off, please let me say, ignore the username that you see on here for me. That was an error I made early on and can't seem to change without a Mac computer, according to Apple. Now getting down to reviewing this app. This app is awesome for monitoring your sleep habits, time and being able to make notes for future reference. It's simple and easy to use. I had a suggestion, something I was hoping to have changed, and the app developer Gaurav was absolutely amazing!! I reached out to him, and he got back to me within minutes and within days he actually added my suggestion! I highly recommend using this to keep a record of your sleep patterns. And it's absolutely worth subscribing to. Gaurav Sharma, you are a rockstar!!
items.author: Absolutely Annoyed!, Sleep Diary

items.title: Really Cool App
items.content: Just a few nights ago I started keeping a record of my blood pressure this app is really cool. It is funny how this app just popped up on my phone today. I would recommend this app in a heartbeat.
items.author: frdfranz, Blood Pressure

items.title: i like it
items.content: i like how i dont need to pay for everything, on my other mood apps i have to pay to see what triggers me i like when it tells you what words affect you the most. it has a passcode or a lock on it if you only want yourself reading what u type. it really helped me correct myself. i've been doing this almost everyday and i see the charts and i can see when and where i improve or downgrade. i really enjoy this app and i like the sound effects it makes when your clicking your moods.
items.author: dariusslayss, Mood Diary

items.title: Good app for tracking sleep patterns
items.content: I needed something to help with sleep tracking as I was starting CPAP therapy back in November 2022. This app has been great at keeping me accountable to a schedule and looking at my progress. I can track hours slept, dreams I have had, patterns of sleep as well as other data that I want to review. Only issue is sometimes App does not open right away on my IPAD and have to force close it and then re-open it. Update - have used app 400 nights now and it shows me progress I've made in my CPAP therapy and a lot of useful insights!
items.author: Gadget guy Fl, Sleep Diary

items.title: Fantastic App
items.content: Such a great app. It keeps track of my blood pressure. You won't go wrong here!
items.author: Tippy's Dad, Blood Pressure

items.title: Weight and BMI
items.content: I find this app is outstanding except for two minor flaws that just irritate me but still works out very well. 1: the weight always goes back down to 150 instead of staying at your weight you last put in. It would be much more convenient if it stayed at the weight that you put in instead of having to scroll through the weights to get to where you're current weight. 2: the BMI should be automatically calculated instead of trying to do the calculation manually.
items.author: Rufuslynx, Weight Tracker

platforms.title: Available on All Your Apple Devices
platforms.subtitle: iPhone ¬∑ iPad ¬∑ Mac (Apple Silicon M1+)
platforms.text: One purchase, all platforms. Data syncs automatically via iCloud.

items.question: Do you show ads or track me?
items.answer:
**No.** We've completely removed all advertisements from all Feeltracker apps. We don't track you across other apps or websites, and we never sell your data to advertisers.

Your data syncs via iCloud - just like Apple Notes and Photos. This means we don't need to know your email address, name, or any personal information. Your health data is stored on your devices and in your iCloud account, and it's completely private whether you use the free version or premium.

items.question: Do I need a subscription?
items.answer: All apps are completely free to download and use. Core tracking features work without a subscription. A premium subscription unlocks advanced AI features, unlimited exports, and enhanced customization. You can try all premium features during the free trial period.

cta.title: Start Tracking Your Health Today
cta.subtitle: Choose the app that fits your needs. Free to download with optional premium features.

indexFooter.tagline: Empowering you to understand and improve your health through intelligent tracking.
indexFooter.disclaimer: Your health data is stored on your device and iCloud ‚Äî we never access or sell your data. Feeltracker apps are not medical devices. For informational purposes only, not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
